news.title: The private sector lost 33,000 jobs in June, badly missing expectations for a 100,000 increase, ADP says
news.summary: Economists polled by Dow Jones forecasted an increase of 100,000 for the month. The U.S. economy is expected to grow by 1.4 million in the second quarter.

news.title: Microsoft laying off about 9,000 employees in latest round of cuts
news.summary: Microsoft surpassed expectations on revenue and profit but is slimming down across ranks, organizations and geographies. Microsoft surpassed expectations for revenue and profits but is shrinking across ranks and organizations.

news.title: Tesla reports 14% decline in vehicle deliveries, marking second straight year-over-year drop
news.summary: Tesla reported another year-over-year decline in vehicle deliveries. Company faces increased competition from lower-cost rivals. Tesla is the world's second-largest electric car maker.

news.title: House Republicans don't have the votes yet to pass Trump's megabill
news.summary: It's unclear how many House Republicans are firm "no" votes and how many are wavering. Speaker Mike Johnson does not have a lot of wiggle room.

news.title: A bare-bones deal is Europe's best hope in trade talks with the U.S., sources say
news.summary: The U.S. and EU are down to the wire to strike a so-far elusive trade agreement by early July. The two sides are expected to reach an agreement by the end of the month.

news.title: My wife and I have $7,000 a month in pensions and Social Security, plus $140,000 cash. Can we afford to retire?
news.summary: “My wife of 20 years is a Japanese national and lives in the U.S. as a permanent resident,” he said.

news.title: The last holdout bears are Democrats, these strategists say. Their capitulation could fuel the next leg higher for stocks.
news.summary: The stock market has seen a historic rally this spring, but not all investors are on board. Ned Davis researchers point the finger at Democrats.

news.title: Paramount’s settlement with Trump could open the door to a Skydance deal
news.summary: Paramount Global’s $8 billion merger with Skydance Media has faced opposition from the Trump administration. The merger is expected to be completed by the end of 2015.

news.title: U.K. chancellor’s troubles show it’s hard to implement the austerity that Musk and Dalio want
news.summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer declined to say Chancellor Rachel Reeves would be in her position through the next election. He was asked by Conservative leader Kemi Badenoch.

news.title: ADP says the economy lost jobs for the first time since 2023 due to trade wars
news.summary: Privately run businesses reduced jobs in June for the first time in more than two years, ADP said. U.S. trade wars created a “hesitancy to hire and a reluctance to replace departing workers,” the company said.
